hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:The Prophet (ﷺ) came to visit me (while I was sick) and he was riding neither a mule, nor a horse

chapter.ara-name: باب عِيَادَةِ الْمَرِيضِ رَاكِبًا وَمَاشِيًا وَرِدْفًا عَلَى الْحِمَارِ
chapter.eng-name: To visit a patient riding, walking or sitting with another person on a donkey
